snippet: A glimpse of winter activity by an amphibian in the Northeast.
abstract: A glimpse of winter activity by an amphibian in the Northeast.
lead_paragraph: 2:49 p.m. | Updated My friends who are hockey players have been grinding their teeth in frustration with the lateness of the freeze here in the Hudson Highlands this winter. (That pre-Halloween snowstorm was a tease, with much of the United States similarly lacking much of winter's kick so far.)

headline.main: Dot Shot: Newt Under January Ice
